name: Blokjes
description:
Sometimes, it can be the simplest games that are the most fun. Blokjes is one of those. Place each blokje on the board, either all on black squares or all on white squares. Plan ahead to prepare a sequence of moves to fill the board with black or white to increase your score. When the blokjes get larger and more difficult, you will need to rely the Park ability to skip blokjes that you can't place right away, or to save them for future use.

Featuring a relaxed jazzy soundtrack, and a randomized sequence of blokjes that's different every time, for an unlimited amount of fun!
